Data: Australia have won the toss and opted to bowl. Handscomb to not only debut but also keep wickets.
Behrendorff to Rohit Sharma, no run length, angled away, defended to point
Behrendorff to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length, angled away, takes a few steps forward and guides it to third-man. Very little pace on offer, by the look of it
Behrendorff to Rahul, no run full on middle, hint of movement back in and defended to midwicket
Behrendorff to Rahul, no run full on middle, Rahul nearly turns the face too early, but the leading edge trickles along the ground to cover. Again indication of the lack of pace here
Behrendorff to Rahul, no run length outside off, has a tentative poke and misses
Behrendorff to Rahul, no run length outside off and beaten. Bit of extra bounce but also stopped on the batsman a little
Jhye Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length outside off, hint of that natural outswing that he gets, Rohit waited for it and steered it to third-man

Jhye Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs length, angled in, tucked away past short fine-leg and the timing ensures that it races across the turf and into the boundary, leaving the fielder no chance after he was beaten
Jhye Richardson to Rahul, 1 run length outside off, steered to third-man
Jhye Richardson to Rohit Sharma, no run length outside off, punched off the middle of the bat but straight to cover
Jhye Richardson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length outside off, steered to third-man, there was an initial call for two but the eventually decide against it
Jhye Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs length, drifting into the pads, and Rahul, on return couldn't have been happier. Cashes in with another clip down to fine-leg
Behrendorff to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs length on middle, Rohit presents a straight bat and a high elbow to loft him over mid-on and the fielder races after, dives to save two on the boundary
Behrendorff to Rohit Sharma, no run length on middle, defended

Behrendorff to Rohit Sharma, OUT the short fine-leg shows great anticipation and takes a simple catch in the end!. Rohit goes for a premeditated scoop, it doesn't quite come onto the bat, he doesn't get all of it and ends up spooning it to short fine-leg, who was ready for it before the shot was even completed
Behrendorff to Rahul, no run
Behrendorff to Rahul, 1 run length outside off, steered to point
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run length on middle, Kohli skips down the wicket and defends back to the bowler
Jhye Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs length outside off, Rahul picks it up one-handed over the cover field and it nearly carries all the way
Jhye Richardson to Rahul, 1 run length, nips back in a little, pushed to mid-on and they scamper one
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, no run length on off, down the wicket comes Kolhi to try and blast him through the covers, only gets a thick inside edge near his feet
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, 1 run length outside off, steered to third-man
Jhye Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs slower ball outside off, and this time Rahul controls the shot over cover but times it as well as the one earlier in the over for another four
Jhye Richardson to Rahul, 1 run full outside off, pushed to mid-off and the fielder was hanging on his heels, which allows an easy single
Behrendorff to Rahul, 1 run length outside off, steered to third-man
Behrendorff to Kohli, FOUR runs full on middle and Kohli blasts it past the bowler, down the ground for his first boundary
Behrendorff to Kohli, 1 run length outside off, steered to third-man
Behrendorff to Rahul, 1 run full outside off, opens the face and steers it to third-man
Behrendorff to Kohli, FOUR runs slashed and slashed over point. It was length outside off, too much width and Kohli pounced on it
Behrendorff to Kohli, 1 run length outside off, tighter line though means that Kohli can only steer it to third-man
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, FOUR runs the famous flick of the wrists and over squareleg for four! Full on middle, picked up through squareleg in time honoured fashion
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run length outside off, steered to third-man
Coulter-Nile to Rahul, 1 run short and pulled but a few bounces and straight to deep backward squareleg
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run slower ball outside off, steered to third-man
Coulter-Nile to Rahul, no run length on middle, pushed to cover, Rahul wants the single but Kohli sends him back
Coulter-Nile to Rahul, FOUR runs length outside off and Rahul keeps peppering the cover and point region with these beautifully timed lofted strokes
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run length on middle, pushed to long-on
Zampa to Rahul, no run length outside off, slightly quicker, tries to use the pace and beat short third with a reverse sweep
Zampa to Rahul, FOUR runs down the wicket, finds the right length and hammers it past the bowler
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run short this time, Rahul was ready for it, rocks back and pulls but straight to deep midwicket
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run short on middle, Kohli whips it away to deep squareleg
Zampa to Rahul, 1 wide quicker one but way down the leg side, Good take from Handscomb
Zampa to Rahul, 1 wide quicker one outside off this time and called wide
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run quicker one from the front off the hand again, Rahul cuts but can't beat the diving short third-man
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run length on middle, tucked away to deep backward squareleg
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run length outside off, extra bounce, Kohli rides it and steers it to third-man
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run short and pulled off the frontfoot well in front of square but only for one
Cummins to Rahul, no run length, angled in, Rahul backs away to go through the off side but misses
Cummins to Rahul, 2 runs length on middle, flicked to deep backward squareleg and they quickly turn for the second to make it with ease
Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs down the track and bursts through the hands of the cover fielder for a couple
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run full on middle, swatted past the bowler, who got a hand to it
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run down the wicket comes Rahul, Zampa sees him coming early and fires it in on middle, Rahul adjusts and pushes it to deep midwicket

Zampa to Kohli, OUT down the track, gets to the pitch but flicks it aerially straight down long-on's throat. Zampa got a hint of drift which perhaps resulted in Kohli dragging the ball to the leg side when he may have preferred going straight over the bowler's head
Zampa to Pant, 1 run full outside off and Pant hammers it down the ground where the long-off makes a good tumbling save
Zampa to Rahul, SIX runs down the wicket and Rahul goes through the line, over the bowler's head for a maximum. He got the length and it was also the straighter one
Short to Pant, 1 run length, angled in, helped along the ground to deep backward squareleg
Short to Rahul, 1 run short on middle, hurries onto him as he shapes to pull, pushes it down the ground, in the end
Short to Pant, no run length outside off and beaten by the lack of bounce
Short to Pant, 1 run length outside off, he's bowling them quite quickly, much like Michael Bevan, pushed to cover
Short to Rahul, 1 run

Short to Pant, OUT Pant has run himself out after a brilliant piece of fielding! quicker one outside off, Pant skips down the track and cuts it off the middle of the bat but makes the mistake of running with the shot before it had beaten the diving fielder, who quickly gathered himself and lobbed the ball to the keeper to find him well short.
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run length, angled in, tucked away to deep midwicket
Cummins to Dhoni, no run length outside off, Dhoni has a slash and misses
Cummins to Dhoni, no run

Cummins to Dhoni, 2 runs full outside off, squirted past point and Dhoni takes on the third-man fielder and manages to complete it as the keeper couldn't gather the throw, which was quite poor. That's a runout opportunity missed
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run short on middle, Rahul swivels and helps it along to fine-leg for one
Short to Rahul, 1 run full on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
Short to Dhoni, 1 run full on middle, pushed past midwicket
Short to Rahul, no run full on middle, bit of a leading edge, the ricochet off the stumps goes to cover but they don't get a run
Short to Rahul, 1 run that's Rahul's fifty on return to the side. length on middle, pushed to squareleg
Short to Dhoni, 2 runs another tight two completed but could have been close at the non striker's end but the bowler wasn't behind the stumps to gather
Short to Dhoni, 1 run
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 run length outside off, skips down the wicket and steers it to third-man

Coulter-Nile to Rahul, OUT Rahul backs away to go through the off side but the bowler does well to follow him, cramping him for the room he was trying to make and he only gets it off the bottom of the bat to spoon a simple catch to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Karthik, no run back of a length and outside off, stabbed back to the bowler off the back foot
Coulter-Nile to Karthik, 1 run shorter and outside off, worked off the back foot to deep midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 run just short of a good length and outside off, punches to deep point with an open face

Coulter-Nile to Karthik, OUT Coulter-Nile barges through the defences of Karthik. He dares to shimmy down the pitch, Coulter-Nile hits a hard length and gets it to move back in slightly. Karthik, having left his crease, misses it altogether and is bowled through the gate.
Zampa to Dhoni, no run pushed through on middle, slides on and Dhoni defends off the back foot
Zampa to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni ventures down the track, Zampa hurls it at leg stump. Jabbed away to the midwicket region
Zampa to Krunal, no run tossed up on leg stump, Krunal pats it to cover off the front foot
Zampa to Krunal, no run pushed through outside off and Zampa finds extra bounce, Krunal does not connect with a reverse-sweep
Zampa to Krunal, no run flatter and darted at the pads, whipped to short midwicket off the back foot
Zampa to Krunal, no run dropped short and outside off, Krunal gets back and cuts straight to point
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, no run back of a length and outside off, keeps low and messes with Dhoni's cut. Beaten
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 run short and outside off, slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
Coulter-Nile to Krunal, 1 run on a length and at the hips, whipped with the wrists to long leg
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 2 runs on a length on middle and leg, Dhoni shovels it away to the right of long-on
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length on off, slower cutter, patted to the covers for one. India reach 100

Coulter-Nile to Krunal, OUT Spliced in the air to Maxwell at backward point. Back of a length and outside off, the ball does not come onto the bat either, Krunal aims a pull over midwicket but ends up spooning a catch to Maxwell
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 2 runs just short of a good length and outside off. Picked off to long leg, where a fumble allows Dhoni to get back on strike
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run short and skids back in to cramp Dhoni for room. Tucked away to midwicket
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run short and angling in at the top of off, no room for Dhoni to free his arms, stabbed back to Richardson
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run short at the body, Dhoni goes on the back foot and pulls a single to long leg
Jhye Richardson to Yadav, 1 leg bye short and slanted in, Umesh plays around his front pad and misses the leg-side flick. Off the pad and the ball rolls to square leg
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run short and at top of off, draws a back-foot defence to cover
Cummins to Yadav, 1 wide length, angled in, Umesh shuffles across, misses the leg glance and it's called wide
Cummins to Yadav, 1 run full outside off, Umesh shuffles again, pushes it to mid-off for a quick single
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run length outside off, Dhoni slaps it to deep cover for one
Cummins to Yadav, 1 run length outside off, Umesh shuffles and turns the face early, gets a leading edge, along the ground to third-man
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run length outside off, slashes away to third-man's right but unable to beat him
Cummins to Yadav, OUT shuffles across and this was waiting to happen. Caught plumb in front to a straight, quick ball at 144 kmph and doesn't even bother to review it
Cummins to Chahal, no run full on the stumps and he manages to keep it out, albeit awkwardly
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run length on middle, pushed to long-off, Dhoni refuses the single
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run length on middle, pulled to midwicket, Dhoni is forced to refuse another single
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run length on middle, spliced to midwicket but just short
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 5 wide full and down the leg side, Dhoni can't get any bat on it but the angle beats even the diving keeper
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run
Jhye Richardson to Chahal, no run length, angled in and Chahal blocks confidently back to the bowler
Jhye Richardson to Chahal, no run length, angled in, Chahal was behind it nicely again, defends it to the leg side
Cummins to Dhoni, no run length on middle, Dhoni swats it to long-on but has to refuse the single again
Cummins to Dhoni, 2 runs length outside off, Dhoni opens the face and guides it to third-man's right for two
Cummins to Dhoni, no run length on middle, Dhoni swings to the leg side, gets a thick inside edge to squareleg but doesn't take a single again
Cummins to Dhoni, no run length on off, Dhoni slaps it t long-on without much timing though and refuses the single again
Cummins to Dhoni, 1 run length outside off, pushed to deep cover for one
Cummins to Chahal, no run length on middle, Chahal swings but doesn't get much on it as it trickles to long-on and Dhoni refuses the single again
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, no run full on middle, Dhoni swings again, doesn't get much on it and refuses the single
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, SIX runs full outside off and finally, after refusing 7-8 singles, Dhoni connects, goes over cover, not usually his area but gets a lot of power behind that
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, no run length on middle, another swing but no timing back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, no run length on off, Dhoni skips down the wicket, swings and misses
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, no run length at the body, Dhoni swings as the ball hangs in the air in the direction of fine-leg off the top edge, falls short of the man but Dhoni decides against the run
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 wide
Coulter-Nile to Dhoni, 1 leg bye length on middle, Dhoni swings, misses again but gets a legbye to point

8.35pm Rahul's fifty on return to the side apart, not much for India to cheer about. Even on a pitch painfully slow where shot-making got harder and harder, India have fallen well short of a competitive total, managing only 61 in the last 12 overs. Australia stuck to their task, with the quicks banging the ball on a length as it was sticking in the
Bumrah to Short, no run length on middle, defended back to the bowler
Bumrah to Short, no run length on the pads, misses the flick and is struck on the pad but it pitched outside leg
Bumrah to Short, no run
Bumrah to Short, no run length, angled in, pushed to mid-on
Bumrah to Short, FOUR runs length, angled in and clipped off the pads, past squareleg and a four to get off the mark
Bumrah to Short, no run length outside off, pushed to point
Chahal to Stoinis, no run full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Chahal to Stoinis, no run length on middle, hint of turn away, pushed to mid-on
Chahal to Stoinis, no run length outside off, Stoinis has a flash and misses, Dhoni is quick to whip the bails off but his backfoot hadn't moved
Chahal to Stoinis, no run length on middle, pushed to mid-on
Chahal to Stoinis, 1 run length, angled in, pushed to midwicket for one

Bumrah to Finch, OUT struck on the pad and given! The ball angled in had Finch's number all summer and Bumrah hasn't forgotten as that was full, nipping back in, striking Finch quite low and it's umpires call even as Finch reviews. Two in two for India and suddenly India's total isn't looking so bad
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run length outside off and through him, beaten on the inside edge as he lunges forward to drive
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run length, angled in, kept a tad low but Maxwell adjusted well and also did well to defend it with a straight bat
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run length outside off and beaten again, this time on the outside edge as he pushed at it with his feet rooted to the crease
Bumrah to Maxwell, no run length, angled in, hurries on to Maxwell, who brings his bat down in time and defends to point
Bumrah to Maxwell, FOUR runs length outside off and Maxwell punches this through the covers, finding sublime timing out of nowhere to break the shackles
Yadav to Short, no run short at the body, doesn't quite come on, he is through the pull too early and has to take it on the body
Yadav to Short, 1 run length outside off, pushed to cover and they take off with the shot and it would have been very very tight with a direct hit at the non striker's end
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs length outside off, Maxwell slaps it over mid-off
Yadav to Maxwell, no run length, angled in, pushed to midwicket
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs length, angled in and Maxwell is toying with the field here, as he shuffles across and tucks it away to short fine-leg's right for four
Yadav to Maxwell, FOUR runs fuller and on middle this time but the same result as Maxwell clears his back leg and goes over the bowler's head
Bumrah to Short, 2 runs length, angled in, clipped away to deep squareleg's right for two
Bumrah to Short, no run slower ball outside off, Short wait for it to arrive and defends to point with an open face
Bumrah to Short, no run slower ball, Short turns the face too early and chips it to mid-on, the fielder comes charging in but it falls short despite a valiant dive
Bumrah to Short, no run length outside off, defended off the backfoot
Bumrah to Short, FOUR runs slower ball outside off, driven aerially and just wide of the cover fielder and it races to the fence after beating the inner-ring
Bumrah to Short, no run length outside off, defended to cover
Chahal to Maxwell, SIX runs short, he rocks back and Maxwell is in a dangerous mood, Silences the crowd with a massive six over deep midwicket
Chahal to Maxwell, FOUR runs length on the pads and he has picked that up over midwicket, somehow managing to time it on this surface when everyone around him is struggling
Chahal to Maxwell, no run quicker, flatter one on middle, cut away but straight to cover-point
Chahal to Maxwell, 1 run
Chahal to Short, 1 run full on middle, pushed to long-on
Chahal to Maxwell, 1 run full on middle, pushed to long-on to finish a good over for Australia
Krunal to Maxwell, no run length on off, sticks in the surface, defended
Krunal to Maxwell, 1 run length outside off, Maxwell drags it to midwicket despite the lack of bounce
Krunal to Short, no run length, angled across, pushed back to the bowler
Krunal to Short, 1 run length on middle, pushed to long-on
Krunal to Maxwell, no run quicker one on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Krunal to Maxwell, 1 run length on middle, pushed to long-on
Markande to Maxwell, 1 run length outside off, slapped to long-off
Markande to Short, 1 run length on middle, pushed past the diving bowler for one to long-on
Markande to Maxwell, no run length on off, pushed to cover
Markande to Maxwell, no run slow and wide outside off, Maxwell slaps it to cover
Markande to Maxwell, 1 run length outside off, Maxwell backs away and punches it to deep cover
Markande to Short, FOUR runs length outside off, really really slow and Short rocks back and punches it to the deep cover fence
Krunal to Maxwell, 2 runs length, angled in, pushed to midwicket and they turn for an an easy couple
Krunal to Maxwell, no run length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Krunal to Maxwell, 1 run direct hit and do we have another run-out? Maxwell chopped it to point and ran straight away, had to stretch at the non striker's end but made it easily
Krunal to Short, 1 run
Krunal to Maxwell, no run length outside off, defended to point
Krunal to Maxwell, 1 run full on the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg
Markande to Maxwell, 1 run slog sweep and just short of the diving Rohit Sharma at deep midwicket
Markande to Short, 1 run length on middle, pushed to midwicket
Markande to Maxwell, SIX runs full outside off, enticing Maxwell to go big and Maxwell obliges with a massive hit over long-on
Markande to Maxwell, 1 run quicker one on middle, Maxwell goes back and punches it to long-off
Markande to Short, 1 run length outside off, Short looks to cut, chops it to short third-man
Markande to Maxwell, 1 run quicker one outside off, slapped to deep cover
Krunal to Maxwell, 1 run length, angled in, Maxwell waits for it to arrive and pushes it to squareleg
Krunal to Short, 1 run length, angled in, tucked away to deep squareleg
Krunal to Maxwell, no run length on middle, quicker one, defended to cover
Krunal to Maxwell, 1 run length on off, pushed to long-off
Krunal to Short, no run length, angled in, pushed to midwicket
Krunal to Short, 1 run quicker one on off, pushed to long-on
Chahal to Short, FOUR runs length outside off, it was the slider and Short cuts it behind point and places it beautifully
Chahal to Short, 1 run length on middle, sharp turn back in, inside edge to short fine-leg
Chahal to Maxwell, 1 run full and angled in, tucked away to deep squareleg
Chahal to Short, no run another slider on middle, pushed to cover
Chahal to Short, 1 run length on middle, shuffles across and tucks it away to deep squareleg
Chahal to Maxwell, no run full outside off, Maxwell lunges forward to blast it through the covers but can't get a decent amount of bat on it
Yadav to Short, 1 run length outside off, steered to third-man
Yadav to Maxwell, no run short ball, Maxwell attempts to pull, is too early into hit and takes it on the grille of the helmet
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 wide
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run full on middle, swatted to long-on
Yadav to Short, 1 run length, angled in, Short helps it along to fine-leg
Yadav to Maxwell, no run length on middle, Maxwell makes room and swings wildly but misses
Yadav to Maxwell, 1 run full outside off and brings up a brilliant fifty with a push to long-on
Chahal to Maxwell, FOUR runs full down the leg side and he taps it on its head, reminiscent of Tendulkar
Chahal to Maxwell, 2 runs full on the legs again and Maxwell repeats the previous shot
Chahal to Handscomb, no run length on off, defended to cover
Chahal to Handscomb, no run full, drifting in, pushed to midwicket
Chahal to Handscomb, 1 run length outside off, pushed to deep cover
Markande to Handscomb, 1 run full outside off, pushed to long-off
Markande to Short, no run quicker one outside off, goes back to cut and is beaten for length
Markande to Short, FOUR runs quicker one, angled across, this time he slaps it with a straighter bat, through the covers for four
Markande to Short, no run full on the pads, clipped to midwicket
Markande to Short, 1 run full on middle, hammered to long-on, through the bowler's hands
Markande to Handscomb, 2 runs googly, not picked and Handscomb gets a lucky inside edge, past the stumps for a couple
Yadav to Short, 1 wide length, angled in down the leg side and called wide
Yadav to Short, 1 run length on off, pushed to deep cover to bring up Australia's 1000

Yadav to Handscomb, 1 run, OUT terrible mix up leads to Short's exit. It was clipped to fine-leg's left, a comfortable couple was on offer, Short turned for it but Handscomb decided against after initially calling him, there was a lot of hesitation with the two players nearly mid-pitch and it resulted in disaster for Australia
Yadav to Turner, no run full on middle, mistimed dive inside edged to midwicket
Yadav to Turner, no run full toss, angled in, pushed to mid-on
Yadav to Turner, no run
Yadav to Turner, no run backs away, Umesh follows the batsman
Krunal to Handscomb, 1 run length on middle, pushed to long-on
Krunal to Coulter-Nile, 1 run length on middle, pushed to long-off
Krunal to Handscomb, 1 run length, angled in, pushed to long-on
Krunal to Coulter-Nile, 1 run length on off, slapped past the bowler for another one down to long-off
Krunal to Handscomb, 1 run full outside off, chipped past cover and down to long-off for another single
Markande to Handscomb, 2 runs full outside off and caressed through the cover field, the fielder at long-off has to race across to his left and put in a slide to save two there
Markande to Handscomb, 1 run googly, plays back and steers it to short third-man with an open face
Markande to Coulter-Nile, no run length on off, pushed to cover
Markande to Coulter-Nile, no run quicker one on middle, pushed back
Markande to Coulter-Nile, 1 run quicker one again, punched to long-off
Markande to Handscomb, 1 run googly again, he comes down the wicket and drags it to long-on
Bumrah to Handscomb, no run length outside off, early into the pull and misses. The pressure is suddenly on Australia
Bumrah to Handscomb, 1 run back away, Bumrah follows, gets a thick inside edge to deep squareleg
Bumrah to Coulter-Nile, no run length on off, another swing and a miss and the pressure is mounting
Bumrah to Coulter-Nile, 1 run length on middle, hurries on to him but manages to swat it to long-on
Yadav to Cummins, 1 run full ball outside off, dragged off the inside half to long-on. Mistimed slog
Yadav to Jhye Richardson, FOUR runs length on middle, and he has beaten deep backward squareleg to silence the crowd
Yadav to Jhye Richardson, 2 runs yorker on middle, squeezes it out just past the bowler and they scamper two
Yadav to Jhye Richardson, 1 run full toss on the stumps, pushed to long-on but hit too hard to turn for two
Yadav to Cummins, FOUR runs full toss on off, and he pierces the cover field to turn the match Australia's way again
Yadav to Cummins, 2 runs full on middle, just past the diving bowler and the lack of power behind the stroke ensures they get through for two and finish on the right side of this cliffhanger

Wow, what a cracker we've witnessed at Vizag, which saw a tie the last time India were here. Again, it's a last ball finish which went down to the throw hurled at the bowler's end, beaten by a scampering Jhye Richardson. Australia were coasting with Maxwell and Short, batted like blind men groping in the dark post their dismissals, a brilliant 19th

Kohli Very pleased with the bowling effort, never thought we'd be in this situation but Bumrah can do wonders, even Mayank bowled brilliantly, I thought. We want to give Rahul and Rishabh game-time. Rahul played a really good knock, we had a good partnership, had we gone on though, we could have got 150, which would have been a match-winning score
That's all from us, hoping everyone has their fingernails in tact, goodnight.
Australia won by 3 wickets
Player of the match is Nathan Coulter-Nile, AUS
